nodes.text: Cherff Maota was a male Jedi Master who lived long before the conflict between the First Order and the Resistance. During the High Republic Era, he trained Avar Kriss as his Padawan. He served as a seeker in the Jedi Order and encountered the Force-sensitive infant Sifo-Dyas, and brought him to the Jedi Temple to become a Jedi Knight. Maz Kanata owned a bust in Maota's image, which she kept in her castle on the planet Takodana.

The bust of Cherff Maota was one of the props created for the castle of Maz Kanata in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens (December 18, 2015). In the movie's novelization, the private collection of Kanata notably includes what is described as "a bust of some unknown bearded human." Maota's bust, however, clearly has non-human features.
